en-US.description:
This skill provides up to date weather conditions and snow reports for your favorite ski and snowboard resorts. 

The current resorts that are supported are: 
Stevens Pass, Snoqualmie Pass, Crystal Mountain, Mt Baker, Mission Ridge, Mt Hood* (Meadows, Timberline, and Skibowl), Mt Bachelor, Sun Valley, Schweitzer, Big Bear Mountain, Mammoth Mountain, Breckenridge, Alta, Brighton, Snowbird, Solitude, Deer Valley, Park City, Sundance, Nordic Valley, Powder Mountain, Snowbasin, Brian Head, Eagle Point, Beaver, Blacktail Mountain, Whitefish Mountain and Mount Washington**. 

More resorts will be added over time. Feel free to reach out to me to add other resorts that you would like to see in the skill.

This skill now supports Multimodal devices, displaying a visual component on your device.

Some topics you can ask about:
Today’s Forecast / Temperature
Weekly Forecast / Forecast for specific day of the week
Snow report
Snowfall overnight, in the last 24 hours, season total

Contact Me: Please send your feedback on ways to improve this skill.
hildeapps@gmail.com

Weather information is retrieved from the NOAA Weather API.

*Note: If you just say Mt Hood, the skill will default to Mt Hood Meadows
**Note: Due to the Weather API used, weather related information is unavailable for resorts outside of the US, however snow report data is still available.
examplePhrases: Give me the snow report for Stevens Pass
What is the weather going to be like on Friday at Crystal Mountain
en-US.name: Snow Report
en-US.summary: Get up to date snow and weather conditions for your favorite Ski and Snowboard Resorts.
en-US.updatesDescription: Multimodal experiences are now supported in this version. Alexa devices that have a screen will now include a visual component along with the response.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
Changelog:
- Complete rewrite from alexa-sdk (v1) to ask-sdk (v2)
- Added multimodal support for all intents (will only show if user device supports it)
- Added RepeatIntentHandler, FallbackIntentHandler, NoIntentHandler
- Updated Intents Interaction Model (includes more natural sounding ways to ask for information)
- Added some additional error handling

All functionality remains the same and should be seamless to the user. The main difference that should be noticed is the addition of supporting Multimodal devices.

Testing:
- Ask for snow report for resorts
- Ask for week forecast for resorts
- Ask for specific day forecast for resorts
- Ask to repeat
